event.title: Panel Discussion with youth organisations of Political Parties in Berlin, Germany

body.p: On September 12, the FSFE will host a panel discussion "Internet policy - Only with Free Software?" including representatives from the biggest youth organisations of the political parties that run for the Bundestag in 2013. The panel discussion will be from 19 - 21 hours with a following stand-up reception. The event takes place in the BÃ¼ro 2.0, Weigandufer 45, 12059 Berlin. The event is public and attendance for no cost.
